name: Elecmon
description: Elecmon is a Mammal Digimon. It retained Tsunomon 's mammal-like elements and digivolved. It's very curious and lively, and inherited its prank-loving personality from Tsunomon. Also, Elecmon possesses nine tails, and during battle, it fans out its tails like the plumage of a peacock to intimidate its opponent.
